summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Northeast from East 55th Street to East 65th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Majority Petition numbered 89353 and 90049 to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
